What it is: Encodes despair into mythic substance to be rechanneled into symbolic fuel.
How to use it: Describe the nature of your despair. Ask AI to transmute it into a mythic narrative or artifact.
What it changes: Redirects despair into sacred creative energy.

What it is: Identifies what symbolic figure is blocking your transition to a new stage of life.
How to use it: Describe what you can't move past. Ask AI to identify and speak as the symbolic guardian.
What it changes: Names and negotiates passage with internal gatekeepers.

What it is: Renders chronic psychological states as symbolic afflictions or curses.
How to use it: Describe a long-term struggle. Ask AI to turn it into a symbolic disease or haunting.
What it changes: Gives spiritual weight and symbolic tools for healing.

What it is: Decodes a betrayal into archetypal roles, motives, and lessons.
How to use it: Describe the betrayal. Ask AI to symbolize each actor and interpret its mythic lesson.
What it changes: Reframes hurt as mythic initiation into truth.

What it is: Marks your separation from the collective as sacred mythic exile.
How to use it: Describe how you were rejected or left out. Ask AI to ritualize that exile.

What it is: Designs a symbolic structure or location where one can surrender control safely.

What it is: Embodies a failure as a symbolic figure who grants insight and transformation.

What it changes: Recontextualizes failure as a symbolic teacher.

What it is: Maps the symbolic landscape of your psychological void.

What it is: Analyzes why your life keeps repeating mythic structures.
